title: The Crew™ Motorfest Trial
description:
Try The Crew Motorfest for free for five hours with the free trial!

Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate driving experience! Explore the vibrant open world of the island of O‘ahu in Hawaii as you compete in intense races, themed events, and much more! With hundreds of iconic cars to collect, you’ll have plenty of opportunities to show off your skills.
longDescription:
# TRY THE CREW MOTORFEST FOR FREE!

Grab your ticket to Motorfest and enjoy the game for free for five hours! If you want to continue your adventures in The Crew Motorfest, you can purchase the game and carry over your progression! Everything you did and unlocked during your free trial will be saved and available if you decide to get the game.

Welcome to Motorfest! This all-year-round festival will let you enjoy the best experiences car culture has to offer.

# EXPLORE A VIBRANT HAWAIIAN OPEN WORLD
The Crew Motorfest has settled down in one of the most breathtaking places on Earth: the island of O‘ahu, Hawaii. Join high-speed street races through the bustling city of Honolulu, test your skills off-road on the ashy slopes of a volcano, or master the perfect curve on the tracks.

# CELEBRATE ALL THE FACETS OF CAR CULTURE
Enjoy a variety of thrilling driving activities and choose how you want to have fun with your cars! Discover the playlists and dive into thematic campaigns that will immerse you in the most exciting car culture universes, including American muscle, Japanese-style street racing, and legendary machines of the past!

# COLLECT THE MOST LEGENDARY CARS
Compete in intense driving races, show off your own style, collect the most iconic cars, and much more! Master every driving challenge and fill your collection with the most legendary vehicles ever created.
